thread.title: The next Sonic is mobile game Sonic Dash 2
thread.title_full: The next Sonic is mobile game Sonic Dash 2

title: The next Sonic is mobile game Sonic Dash 2
text:
The next Sonic is mobile game Sonic Dash 2 
Published By: Eurogamer.net - Today 
Sega has announced Sonic Dash 2: Sonic Boom.Hardlight, maker of the first Sonic Dash (which we awarded 6/10 to back in 2013), is once again ...
